origin: How is it "hurtful" when the right thing is done for Jews just because it wasn't done elsewhere? Shouldn't that mean we work harder to condemn other forms of hurtful speech, not that we refrain when it's Jews? It's not a zero sum game. It's so disappointing to see it cast as such https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1102925532604391425¬†‚Ä¶

One of the things that is hurtful about the extent to which reprimand is sought of Ilhan is that no one seeks this level of reprimand when members make statements about Latinx + other communities (during the shutdown, a GOP member yelled ‚ÄúGo back to Puerto Rico!‚Äù on the floor). ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs not zero-sum + we have a serious responsibility to listen to communities when they feel pain.

I also fear brooding resentment,bc PoC are *always* promised that ppl will ‚Äúwork harder‚Äùw/o commitment.

If House leadership is creating a standard & committing to calling a resolution for every incident - whether it‚Äôs the Congressional Black Caucus, CHC, etc, then thats a clear way to address the issue & we can all understand.

But if they‚Äôre not, I think it‚Äôs valid to ask why not.

Why is no one mentioning Jim Jordan's anti-Semitic trope that he tweeted just days ago?  Why is it OK for GOP members to be blatantly anti-Semitic, but not OK for Democrats to call out policy toward another country?

Israel isn't Judaism: it's a country. Israel gets $3.2 BILLION in US defense funding each year. We *should* scrutinize where that money goes, and we should be pissed if that money backs HR violations.

That money is part of the peace deal with Egypt. 

The Palestinians get more aid money per capita than any other group

It's a direct relationship. Egypt is uninvolved. As for Palestine:

https://explorer.usaid.gov/cd/PSE¬†

West Bank/Gaza gets $400m, pop 4.4m, <$100 per capita. Israel (pop 8.7m) gets >$350 per capita.

You're confusing military aid and humanitarian aid. The benefits that the US gets (access to Israeli military technology and intelligence; 100% of the funds spent in the US, etc) results in an immeasurable net benefit than the $$$ paid to PA to distribute to terrorists' families.
